Formed in 2009 in West London when Morrison (Morrison Steam Fayre) and American drummer Tomer Danan (Robbers On High Street) recruited like-minded musicians Sam Beer (guitar/vocals), Laurie Sherman (guitar), Matthew Starritt (bass/vocals), the band took its name from the Stephen Stills song Ã¢â‚¬Å“Treetop Flyer.Ã¢â‚¬ï¿½
